attributes.action: Start respecting the Doctors And Nurses of the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The NHS is demoralised,treated as a pawn in a sad political game, and has no morale and even less money. It's time to respect the NHS and all it's doctors and nurses who save lives on a daily basis, yet get paid poorly, and are treated like dirt.
IT HAS TO STOP.
Please sign this petition and show the government we care and it's time they started to too.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
